author: goldenlabubuwatch @pandawatch88
text:
Bytedance makes 2x more revenue in ads than Alibaba and 4x more than Tencent.

It is wild (and disruptive) that the #1 player of the industry is not listed, it would be like Google was a private company.

Imagine competing against someone with no quarterly earnings calls and questions about why margins moved 10bps.

PDD probably wish they didn't list.
